text: I'm back in Kakigori Atelier Sekka, after strolling around in Sugamo.
Everyone loves strawberry milk-flavored kakigori!
It looks like soybean powder, however...
This stickiness!  This is certainly natto!
This is surely a new kakigori sweet!
It's now my turn to make the best ice cream!
I am at the Mother Farm, in Chiba!
You can interact with many animals and enjoy delicious food, as well.
And look!
This really lovely scenery!
There are friends here!  It's very vast.
I want to make ice cream using the milk from this farm!
It's got to be good, because I will use the milk from this farm!
It's my first time to try milking!
Let's learn how to make ice cream from Mr. Kobayashi!
Any tips on making delicious ice cream?
Add sugar in the yolk.
Stir it, and let air get inside.
It's getting white!
The volume increased a little with the added air!
Dairy cream
and milk are added in a few parts.
Put three drops of vanilla essence...
...then cool the ice cream fluid using ice and salt.
Smooth it out so it cools evenly.
Tada!
It was great!
Run is so cool!
It was really fun today, Run.
[Run]: That's great, woof!
I had too much fun...
Will you show me the way back?
I must go now.  Chef is waiting for me!
